channel.title: Running server error [pi] plz help rep++
channel.description:
i get this everytime i run a [pi] based source (all of them)
[code]Error occurred during initialization of VM Could not reserve enough space for object heap Error: Could not create the Java Virtual Machine. Error: A fatal exception has occurred. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
if you know how to fix il appreciate it thanks.
oh btw my server run is "@echo off title Project Insanity java -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar;-server -XX:+AggressiveHeap -XX:MaxHeapFreeRatio=90 -XX:MinHeapFreeRatio=90 -XX:+DisableExplicitGC -XX:+RelaxAccessControlCheck -XX:+UseParallelGC -XX:CompileThreshold=1 -XX:ThreadStackSize=128 server.Server pause"

item.title: Running server error [pi] plz help rep++
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

‘Fuck PI’ isn’t an opinion, its a statement.
Well then say it in a different way, by saying ‘clearly tells you’ your putting the user down(probably not but it can do as your making it sound like something small and to someone else it might be a big deal).
I wasn’t meaning that, i meant your post as a whole was brutal.

Read full topic
item.source: Running server error [pi] plz help rep++

item.title: Running server error [pi] plz help rep++
item.dc:creator: @whackatre Whackatre
item.description:
@whackatre wrote:

[quote=“Kidpaparoach, post:3, topic:433908”][quote author=whackatre link=topic=536624.msg3923627#msg3923627 date=1329968033]
Fuck PI.

[/quote]
We didn’t need that part in your post.

You don’t have enough RAM as your Java console clearly tells you. [quote]Could not reserve enough space for object heap[/quote]Change your arguments, they look horrifying.

It wasn’t clear to him and you don’t need to be so brutal about it lol.[/quote]

While I help him, am I not entitled to my personal opinion? And of course it’s not clear to him, and calling the developer’s arguments ‘horrifying’ isn’t brutal.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @ottkid2 ottkid2
item.description:
@ottkid2 wrote:

i get this everytime i run a [pi] based source (all of them)

Error occurred during initialization of VM Could not reserve enough space for object heap Error: Could not create the Java Virtual Machine. Error: A fatal exception has occurred. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .

if you know how to fix il appreciate it thanks.

oh btw my server run is
“@echo off
title Project Insanity
java -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar;-server -XX:+AggressiveHeap -XX:MaxHeapFreeRatio=90 -XX:MinHeapFreeRatio=90 -XX:+DisableExplicitGC -XX:+RelaxAccessControlCheck -XX:+UseParallelGC -XX:CompileThreshold=1 -XX:ThreadStackSize=128 server.Server
pause”
